alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Greene; Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 7:20PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Greene, northeastern Craighead, northwestern Mississippi and southern Dunklin Counties through 745 PM CST... At 720 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brookland, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Paragould, Kennett, Leachville, Senath, Brookland, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Oak Grove Heights, Cardwell, Hornersville, Arbyrd, Walcott, Happy Corners, Macey, Schug, Bard, Farrville, Buckeye, Mounds and Halliday. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
